text: Yan Ling Yang is a Chinese female sitting volleyball player. She played at the 2004 Summer Paralympics, winning a gold medal, and 2012 Summer Paralympics, winning a gold medal. == References == == Other websites == * Yang Yan Ling sets up the ball in a volleyball match zimbio Category:Living people Category:Chinese sitting volleyball players Category:Paralympic gold medalists for China Category:1980 births
title: Yan Ling Yang
